"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554066356368726769160600#post_554066356368726769160600
Basically any and all magic in the Yu-Gi-Oh universe is done through games. And because Duel Monsters is the biggest and most accessible game in that universe it would make sense that it would be used as a outlet.

Nerd, "I'm going to use my magical cards as a summon to win against you"
"I'm going to shove you in your school locker and steal your cards to win against you and then sell the cards on Ebay"
Nerd, "That's against the rules of duel monsters!"
"Cards meet ebay; ebay meet cards"
